image.title: New York
image.description: Situated on one of the world's largest natural harbors, New York City consists of five boroughs, each of which is a separate county of New York State

image.title: Buenos Aires
image.description: The city of Buenos Aires is located at the northeastern edge of the flat plain known as the Pampas, which occupies the agricultural heartland of Argentina

image.title: Paris
image.description: Paris is full of places to shop and eat. On one end of the Champs-Élysées is the Arc de Triomphe. The Notre Dame de Paris is a major Gothic cathedral. It is in "Île de la Cité"

image.title: Capetown
image.description: is a coastal city in South Africa. It is the second-most populous urban area in South Africa after Johannesburg
